channel.title: Fixing A Death Bug
channel.description:
I'm trying to fix a death bug, when I log in I just keep on dying. I've tryed many things. But the things I do seem to not work.
Any Help? Thanks :]

item.title: Fixing A Death Bug
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Go into Player.java and search for currentHealth keep going until you see something like if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 10; playerXP[i] = 1155; currentHealth = 10; maxHealth = 10; Check if the currenthealth is set to 0 and change it to whatever you want.

Read full topic
